message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially offering it at $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. However, $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  This offer reflects the product's worth and allows me to make a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, and I'm eager to make a deal.
